title: Essential Pick-ups and Small Item Sounds
description: Over 280 realistic sounds including: Keys, Coins, Access Card, Pills, Latches, and many many more!
longDescription:
Make your project sound as real as it looks with over 280 professionally recorded sounds for your pickups and small item sounds! Keys, Coins, Access cards, Chains, Locks, Latches, Medicine bottles, Bags, Boxes, Tools, Paper and more. Multiple versions of many so you can find one that fits perfectly. All recorded in the same studio environment so no disparity between sounds.


Get creative! If it sounds good, it is good. Try out some of the miscellaneous sounds when you aren't sure what you need.


Feel free to get in touch if you have questions or need something specific!


Sample: https://soundcloud.com/kieran-fitzpatrick-1/essentialpickups1/s-yjD5RvYYQDb
